# Test requirements file with various security issues

# Unpinned versions - should trigger warnings
requests>=2.0.0
flask~=2.0

# Old vulnerable version
django==2.2.0  # Known vulnerabilities

# Typosquatting attempt
reqeusts==2.28.0

# Properly pinned (good)
pyyaml==6.0

# Development dependency
pytest>=7.0.0

# Wildcard version (bad)
setuptools

# Malicious pattern example
test-backdoor-poc==1.0.0
